name: Planet Farm (peridon)
description:
OVERVIEW

You are a Creator who designs and creates planet vessels for Stars who want to have their very own living planets! Meet different characters depending on what kind of planet you've created! A short story-driven game that serves as an introduction to a universe of personified celestial beings!

FEATURES
  • Made in RPG Maker 2003
  • 8 different planets for 8 different routes!
  • Characters are personifications of planets, stars, and other celestial objects!
  • Takes 15-20 minutes for a playthrough!

Warning! Contains shaking and flashing of screen.

NOTE

I am the only one who's working on this short story-based game, so please do point out some mistakes!

Art / Story/Music by peridon
